definition: the girl is already taken (idiom)
name/noun (part of speech)/place (e.g. among winners)/famous/classifier for people
flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful
surname Hua
old variant of 花[hua1]
variant of 花[hua1]/flower/blossom/also pr. [wei3]
to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be
owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)

sentences.english: Entirely women want half for yourself doing god horse?
sentences.chinese: 名花有主的美女们想让另一半为自己做些神马？

sentences.english: She is taken and not available any more.
sentences.chinese: 她已经是名花有主了，不要再打主意。

sentences.english: We close doors and announce to others we've closed doors.
sentences.chinese: 我们把门关上，向其他人宣布我们已经名花有主了。

sentences.english: It is no good dancing with her , she is already attached.
sentences.chinese: 和她跳舞没有用的，她已经名花有主了。

sentences.english: Please also note that my sister is happily employed.
sentences.chinese: 另请注意，我的妹妹已经名花有主。

definition: to rob sb of sth they cherish (idiom)
lit. the falling flowers are yearning for love, but the heartless brook ripples on (idiom)/fig. one side is willing, yet the other one remains indifferent (usually of unrequited love)
pinyin: luo4 hua1 you3 yi4 , liu2 shui3 wu2 qing2

definition: lit. if you have to use force to break a melon off the vine, it won't taste sweet (because it's only when the melon is ripe that it can be removed with just a slight twist) (idiom)/fig. if sth is not meant to be, it's no use trying to force it to happen
pinyin: qiang3 niu3 de5 gua1 bu4 tian2

definition: you should not covet your friend's wife (idiom)
pinyin: peng2 you5 qi1 bu4 ke3 qi1

definition: wife/family/(literary) residence
no longer a child (idiom)
there are plenty more fish in the sea (idiom)
pinyin: tian1 ya2 he2 chu4 wu2 fang1 cao3

definition: destined to meet but not fated to be together (idiom)
broken flower, withered willow (idiom); fig. fallen woman
to force oneself upon sb (idiom)/to rape
fiancé
the pavilion closest to the water enjoys moonlight first (idiom)/to benefit from intimacy with an influential person
pinyin: jin4 shui3 lou2 tai2 xian1 de2 yue4

definition: to throw oneself in sb's arms/to throw oneself at sb
to imagine that one's love is reciprocated/to shower affection on an uninterested party
sweetheart/one's true love/the person of one's thoughts
lit. don't let one's own fertile water flow into others' field/fig. keep the goodies within the family (proverb)
pinyin: fei2 shui3 bu4 liu2 wai4 ren2 tian2
